original_text: And the sons of Noah, that went forth of the ark, were Shem, and Ham, and Japheth: and Ham is the father of Canaan.
korean_text: 방주에서 나온 노아의 아들들은 셈과 함과 야벳이며 함은 가나안의 아버지라

sentences.original_text: that went forth of the ark
were Shem, and Ham, and Japheth
and Ham is the father of Canaan
